description: This table contains income related information of a financial assistance record.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the financial assistance case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: INCOME_FREQ_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the category ID of the frequency with which an income type mentioned in INCOME_TYPE_C is earned.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Hourly


Weekly


Biweekly


Monthly


Annually

columns.name: INCOME_HOURS_PER_WEEK
columns.description: If the income frequency (INCOME_FREQUENCY_C) is hourly, then this column stores the number of hours worked in a week.

columns.name: INCOME_AMOUNT
columns.description: The income amount earned per frequency.

columns.name: INCOME_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the category ID of the type of income being earned.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: INC_BLNG_PAT_RELATIONSHIP_ID
columns.description: The patient contact of one of the patients on the case for whom the income information in the current row belongs to. If the information belongs to a patient on the case,  INCOME_BELONGS_TO_PAT_ID column will be set instead.

columns.name: INCOME_COMMENT
columns.description: A brief comment about the income information in the current row.
